attributes.action: Strip Sir Norman Bettison of his Knighthood
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, believe that the disgraced former chief constable of West Yorkshire Police, who would face charges of gross misconduct if still with the force, should be stripped of his Knighthood.
The IPCC has published its report “for the public to judge”: please sign this petition to give a clear message that this corrupt police officer has contributed to one of the biggest cover up in the history of the British police. It is a travesty that his man receives a state pension for the dis-service his has given the police and the injustice he has delivered to the families, friends and relatives of the victims of the Hillsborough tragedy.
